name: chrome-tab-auto-grouping
description: Chrome extension for automatic tab grouping by domain

scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run type-check && pnpm run lint && esbuild src/background.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/background.js --format=esm --target=es2022 --minify --tree-shaking --drop:console --drop:debugger && pnpm run copy:files
scripts.build:dev: pnpm run clean && esbuild src/background.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/background.js --format=esm --target=es2022 --sourcemap && pnpm run copy:files
scripts.copy:files: cp manifest.json dist/ && if [ -d icons ] && [ -n "$(ls icons/*.png 2>/dev/null)" ]; then mkdir -p dist/icons && cp icons/*.png dist/icons/; fi
scripts.package: pnpm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../chrome-tab-auto-grouping.zip .
